```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(haven)

```

```{r}
pols_df = read_csv("./data1/pols-month.csv", 
                   na=c("NA","O",".") 
                   ) |>
  janitor::clean_names() |>
  
  separate(mon, into = c("year", "month_day"), sep = 4) |>
  separate(month_day, into = c("month", "day"), sep = 3) |>
  mutate(
    month = sub("^-", "", month),
    day = sub("^-", "", day),
    month_name = month.name[as.integer(month)]
  )
  
pols_df
```
